EmailTemplate.name: Substitute Confirmation (English)
EmailTemplate.subject: You're registered!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You're registered! You have successfully registered for {!CampaignMember.Training_Name__c} with the 501 Commons. Details are below! When: {!CampaignMember.Training_Start_DateTime__c} - {!CampaignMember.Training_End_DateTime__c} Where: {!CampaignMember.C501_Training_Location_Text__c} If this is an online training, please click the above link to complete your registration!! Please let us know if you won't be able to make it. Call us at 206-682-6704 or email sfconsulting@501commons.org. See you soon! -The 501 Commons www.501commons.org Remember: Bring your MERIT STARS number with you. If you have not signed up for one yet, click here.
{!$Setup.Imagine_Settings__c.Email_SMS_Unsub_Text__c}
